Text:
I don't know whose opinion is in the text below, but it brings up a very important point that all too few people realize. That point is that they will read this text and believe it instead of downloading the material and making up their OWN minds.

C'mon people. Stop being sheep and use your own brain and intellect to decide if the material is of any value. And don't just apply it to this but to all information that you come across.
